-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.author
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(60) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT author_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.history
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    date_upload date NOT NULL,
    sauce_id integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT history_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.sauce
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(60) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    author_id integer,
    sauce_url character varying(150) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    sauce_image character varying(150) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT sauce_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.sauce_type
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    sauce_id integer NOT NULL,
    type_id integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT sauce_type_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.type
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    name character varying(60) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT type_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.history
    ADD CONSTRAINT sauce_id FOREIGN KEY (sauce_id)
    REFERENCES public.sauce (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.sauce
    ADD CONSTRAINT author_id FOREIGN KEY (author_id)
    REFERENCES public.author (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.sauce_type
    ADD CONSTRAINT sauce_id FOREIGN KEY (sauce_id)
    REFERENCES public.sauce (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.sauce_type
    ADD CONSTRAINT type_id FOREIGN KEY (type_id)
    REFERENCES public.type (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION;

END;
